title: Love Island Australia: Maurice's 'secret girlfriend' unleashes on Instagram
text:
As the Love Island contestants settle into their villa in tropical Fiji, it seems the real drama is taking place back in Australia.

Maurice Salib was savagely trolled on Instagram during Monday night's premiere by his rumoured 'secret girlfriend' Christie Swadling.

Christie, whose social media profile suggests she was dating Maurice until very recently, shared several posts mocking the 27-year-old media executive.

Drama! Maurice Salib (right) was savagely trolled on Instagram during Monday night's Love Island premiere by his rumoured 'secret girlfriend' Christie Swadling (left)

The Instagram posts suggest one of two scenarios: either their relationship ended badly, or Maurice didn't tell Christie he was going on Love Island.

One of Christie's Instagram Stories showed Maurice in the beach hut, with a devil's horn and tail scrawled across the screen.

Other posts labeled him 'yuck', 'rubbish' and 'trash'.

Meanwhile, Christie and her friends have been using the hashtag #TeamChristie to collate negative posts about Maurice.

On Monday, Instagram fan account Love Island Guru shared a post accusing the entrepreneur of only being on the dating show 'for fame'.

They added that Maurice 'won't be running away' from Christie anytime soon, which suggests the pair's relationship never officially ended.

Maurice features prominently on Christie's Instagram page dating back to May, and she has shared various photos of the pair kissing.

Before entering the Love Island villa, the hunk claimed he had 'been single for six months and doesn't mind dating older women'.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Maurice, Christie and Channel Nine for comment.

Love Island Australia premieres on October 7 at 8.45pm on Channel Nine
